desc.p: Contains the message returned to the external application after processing the message.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 30 characters.
Identifies the FUNCTION of the transaction.
The key used to identify the different records maintained on this file.
Contains the transaction ID or message ID for the application that was executed.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 30 characters.
Specifies the GTS.CONTROL value defined in the version used for the transaction.
Contains the message received from the external application to process the transaction.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 30 characters.
Contains the sign on name of a valid T24 USER used to perform the request.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 25 characters.
Specifies the NO.OF.AUTH value defined in the version used for the transaction.
Identifies the date and time of the message Received from external application.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Identifies the date and time of the Message in Queue. This will be updated if the message STATUS is QUEUED.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Identifies the status of the processed message.
It can be RECEIVED or QUEUED or ERROR or VALIDATED or PROCESSED or SUSPENDED.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 10 characters.
The following values are permitted: RECEIVED, QUEUED, ERROR, VALIDATED, PROCESSED, SUSPENDED.
Identifies the VERSION used for the transaction.
Identifies the ACTION for the application.
Identifies the name of the APPLICATION for which a transaction has been done.
In a multi-company environment it identifies the company to which the transaction is entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 15 characters.
Identifies the date and time of the message Processed.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Identifies the date and time of the message received, specific to the current company zone.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Zone time updated only when USE.LOCAL.TIME field is set in SPF.
Identifies the date and time of the message processed, specific to the current company zone.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Zone time updated only when USE.LOCAL.TIME field is set in SPF.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
